title: Queensryche - Take Cover (2007)
description:
Artist: Queensryche
Album: Take Cover
Release: 2007
Bitrate: VBR
File Size: 82.7 mb

Queensryche have returned, after closing the Operation: Mindcrime storyline, with a covers album. Recently, there has been a trend of 80&#039;s recording artists releasing albums of their favorite songs that they&#039;ve re-recorded. According to vocalist Geoff Tate, many of these were songs that they had played around with during soundcheck during their tour.

1. Queensryche - Welcome To The Machine (Pink Floyd) (4:54)
2. Queensryche - Heaven On Their Minds (Andrew Lloyd Webber & Tim Rice) (4:54)
3. Queensryche - Almost Cut My Hair (Crosby, Stills, Nash, & Young) (4:18)
4. Queensryche - For What It&#039;s Worth (Buffalo Springfield) (2:33)
5. Queensryche - For The Love Of Money (The O&#039;Jays) (4:58)
6. Queensryche - Innuendo (Queen) (6:11)
7. Queensryche - Neon Knights (Black Sabbath) (3:42)
8. Queensryche - Synchronicity II (The Police) (4:55)
9. Queensryche - Red Rain (Peter Gabriel) (4:39)
10. Queensryche - Odissea (Carlo Marrale & Cheope) (3:53)
11. Queensryche - Bullet The Blue Sky (Live) (U2) (10:26)
